ygData.subject: Re: Skull of Vier Dal?
ygData.msgSnippet: Ah..  more than I knew.   Sorry, but yer on yer own on this one.  =) Drev
ygData.messageBody:
Ah.. more than I knew. Sorry, but yer on yer own on this one. =)

Drev

> ----------
> From: Spehar, David J[SMTP:David.Spehar@...]
> Reply To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> Sent: Tuesday, April 20, 1999 10:45 AM
> To: 'eq_wizards@onelist.com'
> Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Skull of Vier Dal?
>
> From: "Spehar, David J" <David.Spehar@...>
>
> Good news...sort of
>
> This particular skull is +20 mana and +5 Magical Resistance. The best part
> of it is that i can be attached to the top of a staff (like the priest of
> discord). Just need to find out where to have it attached at. Some NPC
> must do this.
>
> -= Ziff
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: McCartney, Michael R [mailto:Michael.McCartney2@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, April 20, 1999 1:21 PM
> To: 'eq_wizards@onelist.com'
> Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Skull of Vier Dal?
>
>
> From: "McCartney, Michael R" <Michael.McCartney2@...>
>
> If you drop it on your characters portrait, it will auto-place the item. If
> you think you may have the slot already taken up.. unequip everything,
> then try it. If it still doesn't equip.. it is meant to stay in your
> inventory. Not in a bag. In your main inventory.
>
> Hope that helps.
>
> Drev
>
> > ----------
> > From: Spehar, David J[SMTP:David.Spehar@...]
> > Reply To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> > Sent: Tuesday, April 20, 1999 7:29 AM
> > To: 'eq_wizards@onelist.com'
> > Subject: [eq_wizards] Skull of Vier Dal?
> >
> > From: "Spehar, David J" <David.Spehar@...>
> >
> > I found a Skull of Vier (something like that) in Lake Rathe. When I look
> at
> > it is +20 mana and SV MAGIC 25. It is worth 3 plat to a merchant. It can
> > be used by all classes and races. Not sure how the hell to use it though.
> > I've tried removing my totem staff and placing it in my
> > hand...nothing.....tried leaving it in my inventory...nothing. I have no
> > clue how to use this nice item. Any suggestions?
> >
> > - Ziffnab
> >
> >
